import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{firestore}from"../firebase/firebaseConfig";import{collection,query,where,getDocs}from"firebase/firestore";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchDishes=()=>{const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState("");const[dishes,setDishes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchDishes=async()=>{try{let dishesRef=collection(firestore,"dishes");// Reference to 'dishes' collection
let q=dishesRef;if(searchQuery){q=query(dishesRef,where("name",">=",searchQuery),where("name","<=",searchQuery+"\uf8ff"));}const dishSnapshot=await getDocs(q);setDishes(dishSnapshot.docs.map(doc=>doc.data()));}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching dishes:",error);}};fetchDishes();},[searchQuery]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchQuery,onChange:e=>setSearchQuery(e.target.value),placeholder:"Search for dishes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:dishes.map((dish,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:dish.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:dish.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",dish.price]})]},index))})]});};export default SearchDishes;
